import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { PieChart } from 'react-minimal-pie-chart'; import Tweet from './Tweet'; var tweets = {}; export default function User(props){ const location = useLocation() const { from } = location.state var user_id = { "user_id": from, } // console.log(user_id) var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open('POST', 'http://127.0.0.1:5000/user_info', false); xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json'); xhr.onreadystatechange = function() { if (xhr.status === 200) { // Handle the response data tweets = (xhr.responseText); } else if (xhr.readyState === 4 && xhr.status !== 200) { // Handle any errors alert('Error: ' + xhr.status); } }; xhr.send(JSON.stringify(user_id)); // tweets = tweets.data; tweets = JSON.parse(tweets); // console.log(tweets.includes.users[0].id) // return(
{from}
) var profile_img = tweets.includes.users[0].profile_image_url; profile_img = profile_img.substr(0, profile_img.length-11); profile_img = profile_img+".jpg"; console.log((tweets.data)) var recent_tweets = tweets.data; return(

Following {tweets.includes.users[0].public_metrics.following_count}
Description {tweets.includes.users[0].description}

Personal Website {(tweets.includes.users[0].url)?tweets.includes.users[0].url:"N/A"}

); } function activatePie(tweet_number){ console.log(recent_tweets[tweet_number]); }
